      • addCreditCard

        public void addCreditCard(CreditCard newCard)
        This method adds a new credit card to the credit card array created. By doing so, a temperate array that has extra memory location is created for store the new credit card.
        Parameters:
        newCard - the new credit card to be added.

      • removeCreditCard

        public boolean removeCreditCard(int index)
        This method remove a existing credit card from a credit card array. By doing so, a temperate array that has one less memory location is created for copy the remaining credit card.
        Parameters:
        index - the credit card index to be deleted..

      • updateMonthandYear

        public void updateMonthandYear(int index,
                               int m,
                               int y)
        This method sets the new expiry month and year for a credit card.
        Parameters:
        index,m,y - are the credit card index, new month, and new year, respectively.
